attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Given that the people of this great nation have learned the lesson of what damage voter apathy can bring upon a country, and the public reaction seen on various internet forums to things such as a denial of the promised referendum on Europe, and the further flogging of the population with the latest budget, the people should now have a chance to have their say in how their own lives are 'run' by Govenment.
